attributes.action: Build a bridge to the Isle of Wight to save our economy
attributes.additional_details: It is becoming more urgent for the Isle of WIght to be joined to main land.  High unemployment, youth needing access to affordable furfther education with out the massive ferry bills which also puts off people visiting, by building a bridge this will encourage the tourist trade and new business to the Island.  Proposal from Mildford on Sea, Hurst Castle to Yarmouth. Please we need action now not in ten years time.  Since Isle of Skye has had a bridge the cost have shown great opportunties versus the cost.
